Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries
Peter P. Carr Papers RG.055
60 Linear Feet
0 Good
Content Description
Approximately 60 linear feet of Peter Carr's professional records, stored in boxes and file cabinets. These materials are mostly paper/text-based documents, including research papers, notes, and professional correspondence.
